content.title: <TextStyle.Yellow>Welcome to Arcadia</>
content.text:
⇝ <TextStyle.White>Arcadia</> is a <TextStyle.Green>PvE Crossplay</> server for <TextStyle.White>ARK: Survival Ascended</>.

⇝ Inspired by Greek mythology, Arcadia focuses on:
• Long-term progression (No Wipe)
• Balanced boosted rates
• Quality of Life settings
• Friendly PvE community
• Stable and smooth gameplay

⇝ Server highlights:
• XP: <TextStyle.Green>x2</>
• Harvesting: <TextStyle.Green>x8</>
• Taming: <TextStyle.Green>x10</>
• Faster breeding & imprinting
• Boosted player and dino weight

<TextStyle.Red>IMPORTANT:</>
<TextStyle.Red>⇝ Please read the Instructions tab before playing.</>

⇝ Press <TextStyle.Orange>F1</> anytime to re-open this menu.

content.title: <TextStyle.Orange>⇝ General Rules</>
content.text:
• Respect all players and admins at all times
• No harassment, racism, hate speech or toxicity
• No cheating, exploits, duping or meshing
• No bug abuse (report issues to admins)
• English only in global chat
• Admin decisions are final

content.title: <TextStyle.Orange>⇝ Building Rules</>
content.text:
• Do not block resource spawns
• Do not block obelisks, supply drops or terminals
• Artifact caves are restricted unless stated
• Keep base size reasonable
• No pillar or foundation spam
• Structure decay is <TextStyle.Green>ENABLED</>

content.title: <TextStyle.Orange>⇝ Dino Rules</>
content.text:
• No aggressive dinos left on wander
• Cryo unused dinos when possible
• No excessive breeding that causes lag
• Clean up unused babies and eggs
• Follow dino caps if enforced by admins

content.title: <TextStyle.Orange>⇝ Server Rates</>
content.text:
• XP Gain: <TextStyle.Green>x2</>
• Harvesting: <TextStyle.Green>x8</>
• Taming Speed: <TextStyle.Green>x10</>
• Player Harvest Damage: <TextStyle.Green>x2.5</>
• Faster resource respawn

content.title: <TextStyle.Orange>⇝ Loot & Drops</>
content.text:
• Supply Crate Loot Quality: <TextStyle.Green>x3</>
• Fishing Loot Quality: <TextStyle.Green>x4</>
• Cave Drops: <TextStyle.Green>Improved</>
• Boss Loot: <TextStyle.Green>Balanced</>

content.title: <TextStyle.Orange>⇝ Player & Dino Stats</>
content.text:
• Max Wild Dino Level: <TextStyle.Green>300</>
• Player Weight: <TextStyle.Green>Heavily Boosted</>
• Dino Weight: <TextStyle.Green>Heavily Boosted</>
• Faster health recovery
• Reduced food, water & stamina drain

content.title: <TextStyle.Orange>⇝ Breeding Timers</>
content.text:
• Baby Maturation: <TextStyle.Green>x150</>
• Egg Hatch Speed: <TextStyle.Green>x10</>
• Mating Interval: <TextStyle.Green>Very Fast</>
• Imprinting: <TextStyle.Green>Instant / 100%</>
• Passive Tame Interval: <TextStyle.Green>Fast</>

content.title: <TextStyle.Green>Gameplay & Mod Information</>
content.text:
⇝ <TextStyle.Yellow>Cybers Structures (CS)</>
• <TextStyle.White>OPTIONAL</> — not required to play
• Vanilla structures work normally
• CS crafting stations are boosted for speed
• CS Forge smelts metal <TextStyle.Green>4x faster</>
• CS Industrial Forge <TextStyle.Green>6x</>, Tek Forge <TextStyle.Green>8x</>
• Choose CS for efficiency or vanilla for classic gameplay

⇝ <TextStyle.Yellow>Dino Depot</>
• Dino Balls supported
• Helps manage large dino counts
• Reduces base clutter and lag

⇝ <TextStyle.Yellow>Sprinkles</>
• Item pulling enabled
• Large pull range for easier building

⇝ Settings are tuned for comfort without breaking balance.
